title: Operations Analyst (Investment Management)
shortDescription: Our client, a leading investment management company based in Toronto, is seeking an Operations Analyst to join their team...
intro: Our client, a leading investment management company based in Toronto, is seeking an Operations Analyst to join their team. With assets under management of approximately $400 million, they employ a long-short investment strategy and focus on opportunities in North America.
responsibilities: Manage and coordinate all aspects of investment projects
Ensure timely client reporting and regulatory compliance
Monitor daily trade activities and compliance with portfolio guidelines
Perform daily cash reconciliation and security position reconciliation
requirements: Minimum of 2-5 years experience in accounting, investment operations, or fund administration
Substantial experience with various pooled fund structures and marketable securities
Attention to detail and able to work independently
